NK050(wi)009:1: // rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi mchan 'grel bzhugs so //
NK050(wi)009:3: badz+ra bi d+aa ra na n+aa ma d+h+aa ra ni /
NK050(wi)009:5: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje yis
NK050(wi)009:6: bdud dang nyon mongs thams cad rnam para 'jomas pa
NK050(wi)009:7: de nyid gzungs su byin gyis brlab pa'am shar ba
NK050(wi)009:8: zhes bya ba'i gzungsa 'di yang rdo rje ltar mi
NK050(wi)009:9: phyed la mi mthun rgud pa thams cad 'joms pa'i
NK050(wi)009:10: mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)009:11: sangsa rgyas dang byang chub semsa dapa'a thamsa cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK050(wi)009:12: gleng gzhi ni gzungs 'di skad phyag na rdo rje
NK050(wi)009:13: sdud pa po badga gisa sangs rgyas las thos pa
NK050(wi)009:15: ston pa bcoma ldan 'adsa phyi rdo rje'i gdan byang
NK050(wi)009:16: chub shing drung na bzhugs te bdud btul ba'i tshe
NK050(wi)009:17: dang / nang rdo rje ye shes kyi gnas la zhugsa te zhes sam /
NK050(wi)009:18: yang na ri rab kyi byang shar rdo rje ri rab zom na bzhugs dus kyang 'chad la /
NK050(wi)009:19: rgyal po log pa'i snying po ma skyes dgra'i rkang
NK050(wi)009:20: par lcags kyi sdig pas bzung zhig des pha bsad
NK050(wi)009:21: mi dge bcu byas pas mi min 'khrugs te nad
NK050(wi)009:22: sna tshogs btang bas sems can sdug bsngal ba gzungs
NK050(wi)009:23: 'dis skyabs nas bstan par btsud ces kyang gsungs /
NK050(wi)009:24: gang ltar yang sangsa rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo
NK050(wi)009:25: rje'i lus thamsa cad tshogs gnyis las byung ba'i ye
NK050(wi)009:26: shes kyi sku mi shigs pa rdo rjer byin gyis
NK050(wi)009:27: brlabs nasa de nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bo rdo rje'i
NK050(wi)009:28: ting nge 'dzina nam 'di'i dkyil 'khor sogs sprul par
NK050(wi)009:29: byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyomsa para zhugsa so
NK050(wi)009:30: // de nas rgyu gang gis na lag na rdo rjesa sangsa rgyas kyi mathu dang /
NK050(wi)009:31: sangsa rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabsa dang /
NK050(wi)009:32: byang chub semsa dapa'a thamsa cad kyi byin gyis rlabsa
NK050(wi)009:33: kyis gang bshad na gzungs kyi ngo bo gzhi thugs
NK050(wi)009:34: ye shes rdo rje'i mtshan nyid rdo rje khro bo
NK050(wi)009:35: lasa rdo rje gtum po sogs bzhi byung ba'am /
NK050(wi)009:36: yang na dkyil 'khor gyi lha rdo rje'i khro bo
NK050(wi)009:37: rnams kyi byin rlabs dang thugs rje sngags su shar
NK050(wi)009:39: khyad par ni rdo rje'i snying po 'di rab tu smras te zhes sam /
NK050(wi)009:40: rdo rje snying pos smras zhes rdo rje snying po phyag na rdo rje la 'chad pa'ang yod do //
NK050(wi)009:41: de'i khyad par gyi yon tan ni rdo rje'i chos bdun te /
NK050(wi)009:42: rtog pas mi phyed pa'am bdud sogs kyis mi chod pa /
NK050(wi)009:43: rtsa bar gyur pas sam mtshan ma'i rtog pas mi shigsa pa /
NK050(wi)009:44: phyin ci ma log par yang dag par bdena pa //
NK050(wi)009:46: mi rtag pa min pas brtan pa /
NK050(wi)009:47: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis thamsa cad du thogas pa med pa /
NK050(wi)009:48: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pas sam gang las
NK050(wi)009:49: kyang mchog tu gyur pas thamsa cad du ma pham
NK050(wi)009:50: pa'o // de yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang chos bdun po des mtshungs te /
NK050(wi)009:51: sra brtan snying ldan khong stong med //
NK050(wi)009:52: mi phyed mi shigs mi 'jig pas //
NK050(wi)009:53: rdo rje zhes ni brjod pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:56: rnam par 'joms pa ni 'di man chad kyis bstan te /
NK050(wi)009:57: ye shes des gzung 'dzin can gyi semsa can bdud
NK050(wi)009:58: sogs thamsa cad skrag para byed pa ste 'tshe ba'i
NK050(wi)009:60: semsa can de thamsa cad kyi spobs pa ma lus pa 'jila bar byed pa /
NK050(wi)009:61: gzhan gyis dmod pa'i rigas sngagsa thams cad nus med du gcod par byed pa /
NK050(wi)009:62: rigas sngagsa thams cada kyi nus pa 'ching zhing ganna para byed pa /
NK050(wi)009:63: ye shes mngon du gyur dus 'khor ba'i rgyu las
NK050(wi)009:64: sam 'tshe ba'i sngags sogs thamsa cad 'jomas para byed
NK050(wi)009:65: pa / der ma zad sems can gazhana gyis rang
NK050(wi)009:66: la byas pa'i lasa thamsa cad 'jiga para byed pa
NK050(wi)009:67: pa / / mi min 'byung po'i gdona thams cad
NK050(wi)009:68: brlag para byed pa ste 'di yan tshar gcod pa'i
NK050(wi)009:69: pa / / las so // gdona gyis zin pa thamsa cad las thar bar byed pa /
NK050(wi)009:70: 'byung po yi rigs thams cad sngags 'adi'am ye shes
NK050(wi)009:71: rdo rjes dbang du byas nas 'gugsa para byed pa
NK050(wi)009:72: / rang gi rigas sngagsa kyi lha sogs la'ang rang
NK050(wi)009:73: gi lasa zhi sogs gang 'dod pa thams cad tshul
NK050(wi)009:75: sngar ma gruba pa yi sngags rnams 'dis grub para byed pa /
NK050(wi)009:76: sngar grub pa rnams 'bras bu chud mi za bar byed pa /
NK050(wi)009:77: 'di dang gtan gyi dngos grub gang 'doda pa thams cad raba tu sbyin pa /
NK050(wi)009:78: phyi nang gi bgegs las semsa can thamsa cad srung ba /
NK050(wi)009:81: gnod par byed pa'i semsa can thamsa cad rengas para byed pa sogs drag po dang /
NK050(wi)009:82: dran pa nyams pas rmugsa pa'am rmongs shing dbang du
NK050(wi)009:83: 'du bar byed pa ste 'di yan phan 'dogs kyi
NK050(wi)009:84: las so // yang na rengs rmugs gnyis drag shul gyi las su 'adu'o //
NK050(wi)009:85: de ltar gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'adi sangsa
NK050(wi)009:86: rgyas kyi mthusa lag na rdo rjes raba tu smras
NK050(wi)009:87: so // gsang sngags de gang zhe na /
NK050(wi)009:88: na mo ra t+na tra y+aa ya dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'atsala lo //
NK050(wi)009:89: na ma sh+tsan+da badz+ra p+aa na ye /
NK050(wi)009:90: ma h+aa yak+sha se na pa ta ye bsam pa
NK050(wi)009:91: thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde
NK050(wi)009:92: dpon chen po thugs drag po dang ldan pa'i phyag
NK050(wi)009:93: na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK050(wi)009:96: tru ta tru ta chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
NK050(wi)009:97: las byung ba'i sprul pas bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon
NK050(wi)009:98: mongs pa la sogs pa rnams mthar mdzod cig ces
NK050(wi)009:99: pad+mas gsungs / yang bi ma'i rnam bshad ltar na
NK050(wi)009:100: ye shes lha'i ngo bo yin pas nyon mongs pa
NK050(wi)009:101: thams cad sod sod ces pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:102: tro ta ya tro ta ya shin tu sod cig
NK050(wi)009:103: gam phyag na rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyis rab tu
NK050(wi)009:104: sod sod / s+phu ta s+phu ta spor cig gam
NK050(wi)009:105: bdag gi bgegs thams cad zungs la ye shes kyi
NK050(wi)009:106: sod sod / mes sregs sregs / s+pho ta ya
NK050(wi)009:107: s+pho ta ya shin tu spor cig gam ye shes
NK050(wi)009:108: kyi tho bas rdungs shig rdungs shig /
NK050(wi)009:109: g+h+aur+na g+h+aur+na thar bar mdzod cig gam thugs rje'i lcags kyus zungs la bskyod cig bskyod cig /
NK050(wi)009:110: g+h+aur+n+aa pa ya g+h+aur+n+aa pa ya bsreg tu ma btub
NK050(wi)009:111: pa rnams gzhan du shin tu 'byer bar mdzod cig
NK050(wi)009:112: gam legs par skrod legs par skrod /
NK050(wi)009:113: sarba sa t+w+aa ni sems can thams cad la thugs rjes gzigs shig /
NK050(wi)009:114: bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed cig /
NK050(wi)009:115: sa b+ho d+ha ya sa b+ho d+ha ya shin tu
NK050(wi)009:116: gnas par mdzod cig gam 'gro ba thams cad khong
NK050(wi)009:118: b+h+ra ma b+h+r+aa ma phyung shig gam byang chub sems dang mi ldan pa'i bgegs thams cad sod cig /
NK050(wi)009:119: sa b+h+ra ma ya sam b+h+r+aa ma ya shin tu
NK050(wi)009:120: phyungs shig gam phyin ci log gi nyon mongs pa
NK050(wi)009:121: thams cad thugs rjes legs par sod cig /
NK050(wi)009:122: sarba b+h+au t+aa ni gdon dang 'byung po thams cad
NK050(wi)009:123: gtubs la thugs ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs shig
NK050(wi)009:124: / kut+ta kut+ta gnod pa rnams dum bur mdzod cig gam gdon thams cad rdungs shig /
NK050(wi)009:125: sam kut+ta ya sam kut+ta ya shin tu dum bur
NK050(wi)009:126: mdzod cig gam 'jig rten na gnod par byed pa
NK050(wi)009:127: thams cad byams pa'i thugs rjes rdungs shig /
NK050(wi)009:128: sarba sh+aa t+r+auna dgra bgegs thams cad yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis sregs shig /
NK050(wi)009:129: g+ha ta g+ha ta thams cad thugs rjes sod cig
NK050(wi)009:130: gam brtse ba med pa rnams gzhan du bskrad par
NK050(wi)009:131: mdzod cig / sam g+ha ta ya sam g+ha ta
NK050(wi)009:132: ya legs par sod cig gam shin tu phyin par
NK050(wi)009:133: mdzod cig / mdzod cig / sarba bid+y+aam badz+ra badz+ra
NK050(wi)009:134: las thams cad rig pa can khyod kyi rdo rjer
NK050(wi)009:135: mchod cig gam rdo rje 'bar bas 'grub par gyis
NK050(wi)009:136: mdzod cig / mdzod cig / shig / s+pho ta
NK050(wi)009:137: ya badz+ra badz+ra ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar bas
NK050(wi)009:138: nyon mongs pa thams cad sod cig gam gtor cig
NK050(wi)009:139: mdzod cig / mdzod cig / shig / / ka
NK050(wi)009:140: ta badz+ra badz+ra ye shes grub pa'i rdo rje 'bar
NK050(wi)009:141: bas nyon mongs pa thams cad chod cig gam bsad
NK050(wi)009:142: mdzod cig / mdzod cig / shig / / par
NK050(wi)009:143: mdzod cig / ma ta badz+ra badz+ra byang chub sems
NK050(wi)009:144: kyi rdo rjes gdug pa can thams cad gtubs shig
NK050(wi)009:146: ma tha badz+ra badz+ra ye shes kyi rdo rjes bgegs thams cad thul cig gam phug cig pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:147: at+ta h+aa sa n+ai la badz+ra khyod kyi ye shes
NK050(wi)009:148: kyi rdo rje sngon po phyag na bsnams pas dbyungs
NK050(wi)009:149: pa dang bcad pa'i phrin las mdzod cig gam rdo
NK050(wi)009:150: rje rnon po me 'dra bas nyon mongs pa'i bag
NK050(wi)009:152: su badz+ra ya s+w+aa h+aa las thams cad chos kyi
NK050(wi)009:153: dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyis legs par
NK050(wi)009:154: mdzod cig gam thugs yang dag par mkhyen pa'i rdo
NK050(wi)009:155: rje chos dbyings rnam par dag pa la legs par
NK050(wi)009:156: spyod cig / 'di yan chod rdo rje snying por byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags so //
NK050(wi)009:157: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la bskul ba bstan nas /
NK050(wi)009:158: ye shes bzhi la spyir bskul ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)009:160: ni ru phul+lu me long lta ba'i ye shes la
NK050(wi)009:161: sogs pa las sprul pa'i khro bo rnams kyis sdug
NK050(wi)009:162: bsngal chen po'i rgyu rnams gcod cig pa'am rdo rje
NK050(wi)009:163: 'bar bas khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams thugs
NK050(wi)009:165: grih+na kul+lu gzhom par mdzod cig gam sems can thams
NK050(wi)009:166: cad kyi gshin rje'i sdug bsngal thams cad choms shig
NK050(wi)009:168: ku ru kul+lu dag par mdzod cig gam dpal rta
NK050(wi)009:169: mgrin sngon po 'bar bas sdug bsngal thams cad sbyong
NK050(wi)009:170: shig / badz+ra bi dza ya y+aa s+w+aa h+aa rnam
NK050(wi)009:171: par rgyal ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes zhi bar
NK050(wi)009:172: mdzod cig gam khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil bas nyon
NK050(wi)009:173: mongs thams cad bdud rtsir byin gyis rlobs shig /
NK050(wi)009:174: k+ai li k+ai la ya s+w+aa h+aa ye shes kyi
NK050(wi)009:175: phur bus zhi ba'i las mdzod cig gam khro bo
NK050(wi)009:176: stobs po che'i drag shul gyi las mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:177: ka ta ka ta khro bo'i rgyal pos bdud thams cad spa bkongs shig /
NK050(wi)009:178: ma ta ma ta 'gro rnams mya ngan las 'das
NK050(wi)009:179: pa'i bde ba la sbyor cig gam khro bo h+aum
NK050(wi)009:180: ka ras nyon mongs pa thams cad las skyobs shig
NK050(wi)009:181: / ra ta ra ta sdug bsngal rnams med par
NK050(wi)009:182: mdzod cig gam khro mo pad+ma 'khyil bas nyon mongs
NK050(wi)009:183: pa thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:184: mo ta na pra mo ta n+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa
NK050(wi)009:185: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams las bsgral bar mdzod cig
NK050(wi)009:186: gam ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar bas gshin rje
NK050(wi)009:187: gtogs shig / tsa ra nish+tsa ra dpal phun sum
NK050(wi)009:188: tshogs pa la sbyor shig gam khro rgyal n+ai la
NK050(wi)009:189: dan+dasa bdag dang sems can rnams la tshe dang dbang
NK050(wi)009:190: gtogs shig / stsol cig / ha ra ha ra
NK050(wi)009:191: nyon mongs pa sogs phrogs shig gam ye shes kyi
NK050(wi)009:192: gshog pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las skyobs shig /
NK050(wi)009:193: sa ra sa ra snying po'am phul du byung ba'i blo skyed cig /
NK050(wi)009:194: m+aa ra ya mdor na ye shes bzhi'i rang bzhin
NK050(wi)009:195: gyis bar du gcod pa rnams zhi bar mdzod cig
NK050(wi)009:196: gam nyon mongs pa rnams sod la rdul du rlog
NK050(wi)009:197: cig / de ltar thugs kyi rang bzhin ye shes la bskul ba bstan nas /
NK050(wi)009:198: khro bo rnams sku'i rang bzhin la bskul ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)009:199: badz+ra bi d+aa ra na ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK050(wi)009:200: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi
NK050(wi)009:201: bag chags ngan pa'i dri ma rnasama zhi zhing med
NK050(wi)009:202: par mdzod cig gam las mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:203: ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da rta mgrin gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar chod cig /
NK050(wi)009:204: b+hin+da b+hin+da phye mar rlogs shig pa'am sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyis shig /
NK050(wi)009:205: ma h+aa k+ai li k+ai la ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK050(wi)009:206: khyed kyi sku'i phur bu chen pos nyon mongs sogs
NK050(wi)009:207: zhi bar mdzod cig gam khro bo stobs po ches
NK050(wi)009:208: nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:209: b+han+da b+han+da ma rung pa rnams chings shig gam khro
NK050(wi)009:210: bo tak+ki r+aa dzas gdug pa can gyi bdud rnams
NK050(wi)009:212: kro d+ha k+ai li k+ai la ya s+w+aa h+aa khros
NK050(wi)009:213: shing 'khrugs pa'i phur bus las ngan pa rnams med
NK050(wi)009:214: par mdzod cig gam khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil bas
NK050(wi)009:215: gdug pa rnams zhi bar mdzod cig ces gtso sngags
NK050(wi)009:216: so // khro bo bzhi'i snying po'i sgo nas bskul ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)009:217: tsu ru tsu ru khro bo a mo g+ha p+aa shas phrin las mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:218: tsan+da khro bo'i rgyal po tshur spyon dam tshig la dgongs shig /
NK050(wi)009:219: k+ai li k+ai l+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa khro bo chen
NK050(wi)009:220: po rdo rje gtum po'i phur bus bgegs rnams zhi
NK050(wi)009:221: bar mdzod cig gam khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i
NK050(wi)009:222: thugs tshad med pa'i gsung sgras thams cad byang chub
NK050(wi)009:223: sems su zhi bar mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:224: tra sa ya tra sa ya khro bo ma h+aa ba las bgegs skrod cig /
NK050(wi)009:225: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya s+w+aa h+aa khro chen
NK050(wi)009:226: k+ai li k+ai la ya yi phur bus bgegs rnams
NK050(wi)009:228: ha ra ha ra badz+ra d+h+aa r+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa
NK050(wi)009:229: khro chen rdo rje 'chang ste rdo rje be con
NK050(wi)009:230: gyi phur bus bgegs rnams 'dar bar mdzod cig gam
NK050(wi)009:231: rdo rje 'bar ba'i sgo ba bzhis bgegs thams cad
NK050(wi)009:232: sregs shig / pra ha ra pra ha ra khro
NK050(wi)009:233: chen bdud rtsi 'khyil bas mtshan ma'i rtog pa thams
NK050(wi)009:235: badz+ra pra b+hany+dza n+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa khro chen rdo
NK050(wi)009:236: rje tho ba'i phur bus bgegs rnams med par mdzod
NK050(wi)009:237: cig gam byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'bar bas
NK050(wi)009:238: nyon mongs bag chags thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig
NK050(wi)009:239: / de ltar snying po'i sgo nas bskul ba bstan nas /
NK050(wi)009:240: de dag gsung gi sgo nas bskul ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)009:241: ma tis+thi ra badz+ra blo gros phul du byung ba
NK050(wi)009:242: rnams kyi sems kyi rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi
NK050(wi)009:243: g.yo bar mdzod cig gam blo brtan pa'i rdo rje
NK050(wi)009:244: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du ldan par gyis
NK050(wi)009:245: shig / shu tis+thi ra badz+ra shin tu brtan pa'i
NK050(wi)009:246: rdo rjes legs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur
NK050(wi)009:247: cig gam legs par brtan par mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:248: pra ti s+thi ra badz+ra so sor brtan pa'i rdo
NK050(wi)009:249: rjes bdag gi lus brtan par mdzod cig gam rab
NK050(wi)009:251: ma h+aa badz+ra chen po rdo rjes bdud las rgyal
NK050(wi)009:252: bar mdzod cig gam chen po rnams kyi tshul du
NK050(wi)009:254: a pra ti ha ta badz+ra rab tu g.yo ba
NK050(wi)009:255: med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje legs par gsol
NK050(wi)009:256: cig / a mo g+ha badz+ra don yod pa'i rdo
NK050(wi)009:257: rjes gzhan thams cad 'joms pa'am ye shes chen po'i
NK050(wi)009:258: phrin las rnams don yod par mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:259: e h+ye hi badz+ra ye shes kyi rdo rje dang
NK050(wi)009:260: ldan pa gdul bya'i rgyud la gshegs shig gam bden
NK050(wi)009:261: pa'i rdo rjes bdag 'khor ba las drongs shig /
NK050(wi)009:262: sh+r+ai g+h+r+aa badz+ra d+h+aa r+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa dpa' bar
NK050(wi)009:263: 'gro ba'i rdo rjes rings par bdag gi las 'grub
NK050(wi)009:264: par mdzod cig gam myur du zhi ba'i las mdzod
NK050(wi)009:265: cig / d+ha ra d+ha ra ni sgo bzhi'i srung
NK050(wi)009:266: ba bstan te byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin thams
NK050(wi)009:267: cad khyer la gzungs su gyis sam 'byung po rnams
NK050(wi)009:268: cig / zungs shig / d+hi ri d+hi ri dbyings
NK050(wi)009:269: kyi rang bzhin chos nyid dang ldan par gyis sam
NK050(wi)009:270: 'byung po bzung zin pa rnams thog shig /
NK050(wi)009:271: d+hu ru d+hu ru lus thams cad thugs rjes zungs
NK050(wi)009:272: la thogs shig go btags pa rnams mi 'chor bar
NK050(wi)009:273: mdzod cig / sarba badz+ra ku la m+aa barta ya
NK050(wi)009:274: s+w+aa h+aa rdo rje 'khor lo dang bcas pas bdag
NK050(wi)009:275: la byin gyis rlobs shig gam rdo rje'i rigs thams
NK050(wi)009:276: cad kyis zhi ba dang ldan par byin gyis rlabs
NK050(wi)009:277: mdzod cig / mdzod cig / a mu ka m+aa
NK050(wi)009:278: ra ya phata bdag dus ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa
NK050(wi)009:279: las bzlog la bdud thams cad choms shig gam bar
NK050(wi)009:280: du gcod pa rnams bzlog pa gsod pa'i las mdzod
NK050(wi)009:281: mdzod cig / mdzod cig / cig / na mas+sa
NK050(wi)009:282: man+ta badz+ra n+aam kun tu bzang po'i ye shes rdo
NK050(wi)009:283: rje'i rang bzhin gyis dbang bskur cig gam rdo rje'i
NK050(wi)009:284: rang bzhin gyis bdag kun nas phyag 'tshal pa'i gnas
NK050(wi)009:285: mdzod cig / mdzod cig / cig / su mdzod
NK050(wi)009:286: cig / sarba badz+ra ku lam m+aa bar+t+aa ya stobs
NK050(wi)009:287: po ches dbang bsgyur cig gam stobs chen po dang
NK050(wi)009:288: ldan pa rnams kyis bstod cing dgyes pa'i gnas su
NK050(wi)009:289: mdzod cig / mdzod cig / cig / su mdzod
NK050(wi)009:290: cig / mdzod cig / ma h+aa b+aa le stobs
NK050(wi)009:291: po ches mgyogs pa rlung dang 'dra bar dbang bskur
NK050(wi)009:292: mdzod cig / mdzod cig / cig / su mdzod
NK050(wi)009:293: cig / mdzod cig / cig / ka ta pa
NK050(wi)009:294: le ta ta le ye shes kyi mche bas nyon
NK050(wi)009:296: a tsa le khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi sprul pas
NK050(wi)009:297: dbang bskur la skyobs shig gam bgegs rnams thob la
NK050(wi)009:299: man+da la ma ye dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i srungs ma
NK050(wi)009:300: rnams kyis sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi che ba
NK050(wi)009:302: a ti badz+ra rdo rjee bzang pos thams cad la
NK050(wi)009:303: skyobs shig gam ye shes mchog dang ldan pa rnams
NK050(wi)009:304: kyis dkyil 'khor skyor ba rnams bdag la 'go bar
NK050(wi)009:305: mdzod / ma h+aa ba le be ga ra na
NK050(wi)009:306: ra na stobs po ches mgyogs pa rlung dang 'dra
NK050(wi)009:307: bas gnod pa thams cad zhi ba'am med par mdzod
NK050(wi)009:308: mdzod / cig / +aa dzi te dz+wa la dz+wa
NK050(wi)009:309: la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis bdud dang log
NK050(wi)009:310: 'dren rnams sregs shig gam ye shes chen po'i me
NK050(wi)009:312: ti ti ti ti pinga ga le so sor 'bar
NK050(wi)009:313: bas sdug bsngal las skyobs shig gam rab tu 'bar
NK050(wi)009:314: bar bsdus pas gnod pa rnams las srungs shig /
NK050(wi)009:315: da ha da ha bdag gi nyon mongs pa rnams sregs shig /
NK050(wi)009:316: te dzo ba ti yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis
NK050(wi)009:317: gti mug pa rnams sol cig gam gzi brjid dang
NK050(wi)009:318: ldan pa'i mes sreg par mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:319: ti li ti li sdug bsngal thams cad med par gyis shig gam bcad par mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:320: b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha bgegs dang 'byung po thams cad chings shig gam sregs shig /
NK050(wi)009:321: ma h+aa ba le stobs po ches las mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:322: badz+ra ung+ku sha dz+wa l+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK050(wi)009:323: rdo rje 'khor lo me dang 'dra bas mtshan ma
NK050(wi)009:324: thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig gam rdo rje'i lus
NK050(wi)009:325: 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i stobs chen pos bgegs rnams
NK050(wi)009:326: zhi zhing med par mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:327: de yan chad khro bo bcu'i rang gi las bshad pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:328: da ni ye shes kyi khro bo lag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin ston te /
NK050(wi)009:329: na mo rat+na tra y+aa ya /
NK050(wi)009:330: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK050(wi)009:331: na mash+tsan+da badz+ra p+aa na ye gnod sbyin gyi sde
NK050(wi)009:332: dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal
NK050(wi)009:333: lo // ma h+aa yak+sha se n+aa pa ta ye
NK050(wi)009:334: sngags kyi mgon po ste gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
NK050(wi)009:335: chen po lag na rdo rje'i ye shes kyi ngo
NK050(wi)009:336: lo // bor bzhugs pa'o // tad+ya th+aa 'di lta ste /
NK050(wi)009:337: ni rab basngagasa te bkra shis pa'i don no //
NK050(wi)009:338: ha ra ha ra badz+ra ye shes kyi lag na
NK050(wi)009:339: rdo rje dbus su bzhugs pa ste gtso bo'i sngags
NK050(wi)009:340: so // yang na gdug pa can rnams kyi srog ye shes kyi rdo rjes phrogs shig pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:341: ma tha ma tha badz+ra h+aum ka ra gshin rje
NK050(wi)009:342: gshed du bstan pa ste ye shes kyi rdo rjes
NK050(wi)009:343: de dag la brdeg par mdzod cig /
NK050(wi)009:344: d+hu na d+h+au na badz+ra mtshan ma thams cad 'joms pas khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi snying po'o //
NK050(wi)009:345: da ha da ha badz+ra rta mgrin gyi snying po ste ye shes rdo rjes sregs shig pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:346: pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i snying po ste ye shes rdo rjes chom shig pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:347: d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra stobs po che'i snying po
NK050(wi)009:348: ste gnod pa can 'bros pa rnams zungs shig pa'o
NK050(wi)009:349: // d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya badz+ra gzhan gyis
NK050(wi)009:350: mi thub pa'i snying po ste ye shes can khyed
NK050(wi)009:351: kyis 'khor rnams 'dzin du chug cig pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:352: d+aa ru na d+aa ru na badz+ra mi g.yo mgon po'i snying po ste drag tu zungs shig pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:353: ts+tshin+da ts+tshan+da badz+ra dbyug pa sngon po'i snying po ste bzung zin pa rnams rdo rjes chod cig pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:354: b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha badz+ra h'u phata pad+ma 'khyil ba'i snying po
NK050(wi)009:355: ste ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi thugs kyis khos
NK050(wi)009:356: shig pa'o // de yan chad khro bo'i rang bzhin
NK050(wi)009:357: bshad pa ste khro bo dang sbyar tshul 'di la
NK050(wi)009:358: 'grel pa rnams su 'dra min mang du mchis kyang
NK050(wi)009:359: 'dir bshad pa ni slob dpon bi ma la'i dgongs
NK050(wi)009:360: shig pa'o // pa'o // na ma sh+tsan+da badz+ra kro
NK050(wi)009:361: d+h+aa ya dngos grub kyi mchog 'grub pa'i phyir khro
NK050(wi)009:362: bo rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK050(wi)009:363: da ni sgo ma bzhi'i don ston te /
NK050(wi)009:364: hu lu hu lu shar gyi sgo bas bgegs dang
NK050(wi)009:365: 'byung po thams cad tshur drangs shig gam drag tu
NK050(wi)009:366: khug cig / ti sh+tha tish+tha lho'i sgo bas chings
NK050(wi)009:367: shig gam bdag gi mdun du gnas par mdzod cig
NK050(wi)009:368: khug cig / / b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha nub kyi sgo bas
NK050(wi)009:369: bgegs dang log 'dren thams can choms shig gam chings
NK050(wi)009:370: khug cig / / shig / ha na ha na
NK050(wi)009:371: byang gi sgo bas gtogs shig gam bcing ba rnams
NK050(wi)009:374: ces pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags te /
NK050(wi)009:375: las de dag thams cad kyang mthar phyin cing phyir
NK050(wi)009:376: mi ldog pa'i sa la bzhag nas 'chi ba med
NK050(wi)009:377: pa'i gnas la sbyor bar mdzod cig ces gang gi
NK050(wi)009:378: sngags thams cad kyi lhag chad kha skong ba'o //
NK050(wi)009:379: de ltar khro bo rnams kyi don bshad nas /
NK050(wi)009:380: da ni gzungs kyi phan yon bstan pa ni /
NK050(wi)009:381: sngon bsags pa'i rgyu sdiga pa mi dge ba mtshams
NK050(wi)009:382: med pa la sogs thams cad byang bar byas nas
NK050(wi)009:383: / 'bras bu sdug bsngal ba thamsa cad med para byed do //
NK050(wi)009:384: rdo rje lhun po ri rab zom la sogs par
NK050(wi)009:385: phyag na rdo rje'i rgyud brgya rtsa brgyad sogs mdo
NK050(wi)009:386: sde dang rgyud do cog mtha' dag gi rtsa ba
NK050(wi)009:388: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas
NK050(wi)009:389: kyi yon tan gyi bar gyi dapala kun gyis ni
NK050(wi)009:390: legas para brgyana par gyur ro //
NK050(wi)009:391: de yang semsa can gyi sdug bsngal gyi bye brag
NK050(wi)009:392: yid dbang gtso bor gyur pa'i dabnga po rnams nyamsa
NK050(wi)009:393: pa dang / sngon gyi las kyis tshe zada pa dang 'phral gyi rkyen las tshe nyamsa pa dang /
NK050(wi)009:394: las kyi dbang gis 'byor pa dang mi ldan pa
NK050(wi)009:395: sogs phun sum tshogsa pa mina pa ste rgud pa'i
NK050(wi)009:396: phyogs gang gi rgyud la chagsa pa ste yod pa
NK050(wi)009:397: dang / 'das ma 'das kyi lha rnams kyis rgyab kyisa phyogsa pa ste grogs mi byed pa dang /
NK050(wi)009:398: lha g.yel ba'i rtags su rang gi gnyen sogs sngar
NK050(wi)009:399: madza'a sdug gi skye bo yang rang la sdang ba
NK050(wi)009:400: dang / bram ze'am rang gi 'khor gyi bran dang
NK050(wi)009:401: bza' mi la sogsa gdon sogs gzhan gyis gtsesa pa
NK050(wi)009:402: 'am yang na bran sogs dman pa gzhan gyis brnyas
NK050(wi)009:403: dang / pa dang / gang phan tshun sems mthun pa ma yin pa dang /
NK050(wi)009:404: nor dang longs spyod rgud nas 'grib pas ni gnoda pa dang /
NK050(wi)009:405: sems mi bde ba'i mya ngana dang lus ngala ba dang sha za sogs kyis gnod pa dang /
NK050(wi)009:406: rgyal po'i chad pa dang me chu gcan gzan sogs
NK050(wi)009:407: kyis 'jigas shing skrags pa dang ni bde bas phongsa
NK050(wi)009:408: pa dang / r+aa hu sogs gaza'a dang smin drugs
NK050(wi)009:409: sogs rgyu skar ngan pa dang drang srong gi dmod
NK050(wi)009:411: mthu che ba srin po sogs mi bazada pa'i gdona gyis nyen pa dang /
NK050(wi)009:412: sems mya ngana dang lus ngala dub las byung ba yis /
NK050(wi)009:413: dbang po nyams pa nas mya ngan ngal ba'i bar
NK050(wi)009:414: gyi rtags su gyur pa'i rmi lam sdig pa ste
NK050(wi)009:415: ngan pa sdug bsngal gyi rtags dper na de bzhin
NK050(wi)009:416: gshegs pa byang chub snying por gshegs kar bdud la
NK050(wi)009:417: mya ngan gyi snga ltas rmi lam so gnyis byung
NK050(wi)009:418: bar rgya rol las gsungs pa lta bu mthonga na
NK050(wi)009:419: yanga / gang zag desa ni de bzlog pa'i thabs
NK050(wi)009:420: su dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs par byas nas
NK050(wi)009:421: slob dpon gyis bdud rtsi'i bum pas slob ma'i spyi
NK050(wi)009:422: bor dbang bskur zhing khrus kyis lus phyi nang rab
NK050(wi)009:423: tu bkrus pa'i gtsang ma yis /
NK050(wi)009:424: byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas mdo sde dam pa 'di nyid mnyan pa dang bklag para gyis shig /
NK050(wi)009:425: nang gi khrus ni gang dag chos la sems pas
NK050(wi)009:426: yida dge ba 'tshe ba med pa'i semsa g.yo sgyu
NK050(wi)009:427: sogs spangs pas dang ba'am dad pa dang ldan zhing
NK050(wi)009:428: / srog chags kyi rgyu las ma byung ba'i ras
NK050(wi)009:429: sogs gtsang ma'i gos dang dri zhim po'i me tog
NK050(wi)009:430: sogs kyis lus raba tu brgyan te zhes sngon la
NK050(wi)009:432: dngos gzhi zab mo rtogs dka' ba sangsa rgyas kho na'i ye shes kyi spyod yul du gyur pa /
NK050(wi)009:433: mdo sde 'di ni nyan cing klog par byed na /
NK050(wi)009:434: mdo sde zab mo 'di yi bden pa'i gzi brjid kyis /
NK050(wi)009:435: srog chagsa dag ni thamsa cad kyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
NK050(wi)009:436: sdug bsngal gyi bye brag dbang po nyams pa sogs
NK050(wi)009:437: mi bzad pa yi nad 'brum bu phol mig mdze
NK050(wi)009:438: la sogs pa rnams kyang byang zhing /
NK050(wi)009:439: de dag thamsa cad yongs su zhi bar blta'o //
NK050(wi)009:440: de'i 'og tu bde ba thob pa'i rtags ston te /
NK050(wi)009:441: mthong ba'i chos 'di la'ang tshe ring ba dang bsoda namsa dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /
NK050(wi)009:442: tshe rabs gzhan gyi sdig pa kun las rnam par thar bar 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)009:443: da ni bum pa'i cho ga bstan te /
NK050(wi)009:444: rin po che dbang gi rgyal bo'am mu tig mig
NK050(wi)009:445: med sogs nora bu dang yungsa kar dang r+ts+wa durba
NK050(wi)009:446: dang / gser sogs rina chena sna lnga gas sogs
NK050(wi)009:447: kyi skyon nam rma meda pa dang tsan+dana gor+shi sha
NK050(wi)009:448: sogs dri zhim po can bcas dang /
NK050(wi)009:449: shel rigs dang rdo rje pha lam dang byin gyis
NK050(wi)009:450: brlabs pa'i me tog sngon po dang bcas pa rnams
NK050(wi)009:451: te / 'di la slob dpon bi ma las ni
NK050(wi)009:452: yungs kar sogs 'bru lnga gser sogs rin po che
NK050(wi)009:453: lnga tsan+dana sogs dri lnga shel sogs snying po lnga
NK050(wi)009:455: bum pa'i rgyu ni dzam bu'i chu yi gsera rama yanga na ni /
NK050(wi)009:456: dngula gyi bum pa'am zangs dag kyang rung ste grangs kyang lnga'am gcig gang rung gsar pa dag /
NK050(wi)009:457: gatsanga ma'i gos ras kha tshar can gyis dkrisa shing
NK050(wi)009:458: lnga tshan lnga dag dri zhim po'i chus yongs su
NK050(wi)009:459: dagnga zhing d+aurba'i kha rgyan dang bcas me tog gam
NK050(wi)009:460: 'abru'am tshon sna lnga'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol te
NK050(wi)009:461: / sngags kyi grangs ni lana grangsa nyi shu rtsa gciga gam /
NK050(wi)009:462: yang na lana grangsa brgya rtsa brgyad du /
NK050(wi)009:463: rdo rje rnam par 'jomas pa'i gzungs bzlas nas ni /
NK050(wi)009:464: rgyal po zhes in+d+ra b+hu ti la bos nas gzungs bzlas te rtag tu khrus gyis shig /
NK050(wi)009:465: ces rgyal po ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
NK050(wi)009:466: thog mar bsnyen pa nas brtsams dkyil 'khor du 'jug
NK050(wi)009:467: pa'i bar du gzungs 'di nyid ci nus par bklags
NK050(wi)009:468: shing bzlas nas gzod khrus kyi cho ga bya'o zhes
NK050(wi)009:469: pa'i don to // rgyud kyi mtshan ni /
NK050(wi)009:470: stong nyid ye shes kyi rdo rje mi mthun pa'i
NK050(wi)009:471: phyogs kun rnam par 'jomas pa de nyid sngags su
NK050(wi)009:472: shar ba la'ang mtshan de nyid thob pas zhes bya
NK050(wi)009:473: ba'i gzungsa te sgrub po rnams kyis mi brjed par
NK050(wi)009:474: dran pas na de skad bya ste de lta bu'i
NK050(wi)009:475: gzhung mchan gyis legs par gsal bar byas pa rdzogsa
NK050(wi)009:476: so // gzungs 'di cung zad 'dra min re zung 'dug kyang /
NK050(wi)009:477: mkhan chen dang slob dpon pad+ma bi ma la sangs
NK050(wi)009:478: rgyas gsang ba sogs kyi rgya 'grel bcu dang bstun
NK050(wi)009:479: nas bdag mi pham pas dag par bgyis pas phyin
NK050(wi)009:480: chad yid rton gyi gnas so //
NK050(wi)009:481: rnam 'joms las tshogs ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa nas nyer mkho ci rigs bris pa ni /
NK050(wi)009:482: tshes nyer gsum la rnam 'joms sngags brjod dkyil 'khor
NK050(wi)009:483: mdun mchod pa byas na rmi lam du dge mi
NK050(wi)009:484: dge ston / mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
NK050(wi)009:485: te byin na sbrum ma bu skye kha la bde
NK050(wi)009:486: dge ston / bar btsa' thub / bdug pa sna
NK050(wi)009:487: tshogs la nyer gcig bzlas pas bdug na byis pa
NK050(wi)009:488: dge ston / bar btsa' thub / gdon las grol
NK050(wi)009:489: / sbyin sreg gi thal ba la nyer gcig bzlas
NK050(wi)009:490: te gtor na rkun ma srung /
NK050(wi)009:491: gos kyi mthar mdud pa bdun la sngags lan bdun brjod pas bdag srung /
NK050(wi)009:492: spyi bo'i skra mdud par sngags bdun brjod pas gzhan srung /
NK050(wi)009:493: yungs kar la bdun basngagasa te gtor na stag gi 'jigs pa srung /
NK050(wi)009:494: phur bur brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te zhing dkyil btab na zhing srung /
NK050(wi)009:495: shing sor bcu gnyis pa la me btang nas 'bras
NK050(wi)009:496: dang 'o thug zho dang sbrang rtsi mar gyis bsreg
NK050(wi)009:497: blugs zhag gsum du stong brgya rtsa brgyad byas na
NK050(wi)009:499: de ltar zhag bdun byas na grong khyer du yang zhi bar byed /
NK050(wi)009:500: mngar gsum sbyin sreg zhag gsum byas na char 'beb /
NK050(wi)009:501: d+aurba'i nyag ma zho dang sbrang rtsi mar la bsnyugs
NK050(wi)009:502: te sbyin sreg stong phrag rtsa brgyad zhag bcur byas
NK050(wi)009:504: d+aurba'i sbyin sreg lan gsum byas na tshe lo stong phrag lnga thub /
NK050(wi)009:505: slong mo'i zas za zhing 'bum gcig bzlas la zla
NK050(wi)009:506: ba gzas zin pa'i tshe ba nag mo'i 'o mar
NK050(wi)009:507: lan rtsa brgyad bzlas nas 'thung ngam byug na bcud
NK050(wi)009:508: len du 'gyur / lo legs shing bu tsha 'phel
NK050(wi)009:509: bar 'dod pas zho'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas
NK050(wi)009:510: len du 'gyur / pas 'grub / rma bya'i mjug
NK050(wi)009:511: mar stong brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te bya bas na
NK050(wi)009:512: len du 'gyur / pas 'grub / dug kun zhi
NK050(wi)009:513: / skud par mdud pa bdun byas la lan brgya
NK050(wi)009:514: rtsa brgyad basngagasa pa mgul du btags na rim srung
NK050(wi)009:515: len du 'gyur / pas 'grub / dug kun zhi
NK050(wi)009:516: / / lam du zhugs tshe rdo rje can la
NK050(wi)009:517: dmigs te lan gsum brjod na chom rkun mi 'byung
NK050(wi)009:518: len du 'gyur / pas 'grub / dug kun zhi
NK050(wi)009:519: / / / gru la brgal tshe chu la lan
NK050(wi)009:520: bdun brjod nas chu nang gtor na bde bar brgal
NK050(wi)009:521: len du 'gyur / pas 'grub / dug kun zhi
NK050(wi)009:522: / / / / yungs kar la stong brgya rtsa
NK050(wi)009:523: len du 'gyur / pas 'grub / dug kun zhi
NK050(wi)009:525: gyi dmag mi yod phyogs dang /
NK050(wi)009:526: dmag gi mgo la gtor na rang dmag las rgyal /
NK050(wi)009:527: mda' sngon por stong brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la pha
NK050(wi)009:528: rol dmag gi sar 'phang na pha rol gyi mtshon
NK050(wi)009:530: yid la bzlas barjooda brgya rtsa brgyad byas na chom rkun rnams nus med du 'gyur /
NK050(wi)009:531: lcags phur la lan stong bzlas nas dur khrod du
NK050(wi)009:532: btsugs na mi ma yin thams cad kyis gnod pa
NK050(wi)009:534: de nyid phyungs na mthong bar nges so //
NK050(wi)009:535: mtshams bcad par yungs kar ram /
NK050(wi)009:538: nad par gdon dbab par gu gul la nyer gcig bzlas te bdug /
NK050(wi)009:539: char bab dka' na mngar gsum dang khrag sbyar ba'i
NK050(wi)009:540: sbyin sreg stong brgya rtsa brgyad bya char bcad na
NK050(wi)009:541: mngar gsum dkar dang sbyar ba'i sreg blug bya'o //
NK050(wi)009:542: ser pa bcad 'dod na yungs kar dang til nag la bzla /
NK050(wi)009:543: sprin bsdu bar 'dod na srin bal gyi mdud pa la bzlas so zhes bshad do //
NK050(wi)009:544: mchan 'di lcags sprel lor thams cad mkhyen pa mi
NK050(wi)009:545: pham rgya mtsho'i phyag bris las zhe chen ri khrod
NK050(wi)009:546: du zhal bshus shing slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis
NK050(wi)009:547: mdzad pa'i rdo rje sgron ma dang /
NK050(wi)009:548: bi ma mi tra'i rnam bshad gnyis dang bstun te zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o //
NK050(wi)009:551: srid mtha'i bar du cher rgyas shing //
NK050(wi)009:552: rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rdo rje //
